EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge Society Reaching Communities Programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for signing up to the Reaching Communities Programme.
The programme will be starting this weekend.
Please come to: Pastures Youth Centre, E11 3DR, on Saturday 6th February at 13:45. Make sure you get there in time of a prompt start.
Could you please respond to this email telling us if you are or are not coming, so we know how many people to expect.
If you have any questions feel free to email Ed, edward.mann@the-challenge.org
We really look forward to starting this amazing programme with you!
Ed Mann
Assistant Graduate Manager The Challenge
